description: Following the 2025 Xbox Showcase, we got an in-depth look at The Outer Worlds 2. The Outer Worlds 2 is coming to Xbox Series X/S, PS5, and PC on October 29th, 2025.

author: IGN
description:
Pearl Abyss, developer of Black Desert Online brought their newest game to Geoff Keighly’s Summer Game Fest to let people get a chance to see how their new game runs. After some hands-on with the upcoming action-adventure game, Crimson Desert, we were blown away by the tech in this game and what it's able to pull off in its demo.

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by PlayStation Days of Play. Get the PlayStation 5 Digital console with the Call of Duty Black Ops 6 bundle. Starting at $399.99. While supplies last.

#CrimsonDesert #IGNLive2025 #Gaming
title: Crimson Desert's Tech Is Insanely Impressive | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
EVE Frontier is a Space Survival MMO set in the EVE universe. This massive online sandbox lets players explore the Frontier, a desolate region of space warped by three hyper-massive black holes at the dark heart of the universe. 

We just got a look at the brand new trailer, and CCP Games CEO Hilmar Veigar Petursson joins IGN's Alan Knight to break down all the details you might have missed!

Chart your ship through 100,000 unique star systems. Uncover ruins, cosmic phenomena, or player-built settlements as you navigate the vast Frontier. Work with allies to construct stargates that connect the far reaches of the galaxy when EVE Frontier launches Founder Access: New Era, on June 11th.

Presented by EVE Frontier.
title: EVE Frontier - Rewind Theater | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Microsoft has revealed the newest piece of hardware in Xbox family of consoles. The ASUS collaboration brings us a Windows-based handheld gaming PC that's meant to seamlessly bring all your Xbox and PC games together through Xbox Play Anywhere. We got to go hands-on with this new piece of tech to see how well it performs.

#IGN #Xbox #IGNLive2025
title: ROG Xbox Ally X: Hands-On With the Next Xbox | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
MindsEye is a brand-new single-player action-adventure thriller from Build A Rocket Boy, the studio founded by visionary game director Leslie Benzies. Set in an intense, super-heated, desert metropolis called Redrock, players will step into the shoes of Jacob Diaz, a former soldier haunted by fragmented memories from his mysterious MindsEye neural implant, as he uncovers a conspiracy involving rogue AI, corporate greed, an unchecked military, and a threat so sinister that it endangers the very survival of humanity. 

Presented by MindsEye. Pre-Order Now.
title: MindsEye - Partner Spotlight | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Following the revelations in the season one finale, John and Quiet find themselves entering the deadly Twisted Metal tournament, a sinister demolition derby hosted by a mysterious man known as Calypso (Anthony Carrigan). 

As they try to survive an onslaught of dangerous new foes and familiar faces alike, including the murderous clown Sweet Tooth (Will Arnett & Joe Seanoa aka Samoa Joe), things get complicated for John when he reunites with his long-lost sister, the vigilante Dollface (Tiana Okoye).

Twisted Metal: Season 2 premieres on Peacock on July 31, 2025.

#IGN
title: Twisted Metal: Season 2 - Exclusive Clip | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
What happens when the voices behind your favorite characters sit down to watch someone shatter their game in a blazing-fast speedrun? In this special twist on "Devs React to Speedruns," we’ve brought together the incredible voice cast of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 to witness speedrunner Oh_Snap race through the game in record time.

Joining us are Jennifer English (Maelle), Ben Starr (Verso), Shala Nyx (Sciel), Kirsty Rider (Lune), Rich Keeble (Monoco), and Maxence Cazorla (Esquie). Watch as they react to jaw-dropping skips, lightning-fast boss takedowns, and scenes they poured their hearts into being absolutely demolished in seconds. Their reactions range from shocked laughter to heartfelt commentary, with plenty of behind-the-scenes stories and character insights that fans won’t want to miss.

#ClairObscurExpedition33 #SpeedRuns #Gaming
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Voice-Actors React to Speedrun | IGN Live 2025

description:
Build your own Jurassic World like never before. Get a closer look at Jurassic World Evolution 3 in this trailer for this new game in the building and management game series. In Jurassic World Evolution 3, nurture generations of awe-inspiring dinosaurs with the series debut of juveniles, create and manage sprawling prehistoric parks around the globe, and let your imagination roar with powerful new creative options. Jurassic World Evolution 3 will be available on Steam, Epic Games Store, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and Windows PC on October 21, 2025.

#IGN #IGNLive2025
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official Trailer | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Is MetaHuman Creator the future of CGI characters in videogames? Epic Games certainly thinks so and they're here to explain not only how it works, but all the recent improvements they unveiled at Epic's Unreal Fest 2025.

Vlad Mastilović, VP of Digital Humans Technology at Epic Games and Matt Workman, Virtual Production Developer join us to discuss all the recent advancements in Epic's MetaHuman tools, allowing creators in and outside of Unreal Engine 5 to create incredibly realistic character models using consumer cameras.
title: How MetaHuman Is Creating Next-Generation CGI Characters

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour reviewed by Tom Marks on Nintendo Switch 2.

Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour is a charming concept, mixing an interactive instruction manual with minigames and tech demos that show off the Switch 2’s coolest features in a hands-on way. The execution of that idea, however, is a somewhat muddled collection of quaint distractions and missed opportunities dressed up as a completionist checklist without much point. This digital showroom is littered with dry informational slideshows that only occasionally feel like they are actually allowed to share something interesting. And while the minigames can be briefly amusing, it was almost never in a way that made me excited to push my high scores or check every single box. Tie that up in a world that’s cute to look at but obnoxious to progress through, and you’ve got a Switch 2 showcase that I certainly had fun with at times, but left me wishing I had just been exploring my new console with an actual game instead. It
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour Review

author: IGN
description:
Both Breath of the Wild and Tears of the Kingdom now have a Switch 2 edition which can be purchased as a new Switch 2 game or updated from the original code via an update patch. This can be purchased for $10, or for free if you have the Nintendo online + extras membership. So is this link to the past update an ocarina of the ages? Our Switch vs Switch 2 IGN Performance review has all the answers.

0:00 Introduction
0:32 Switch vs Switch 2 Visual upgrades and comparison
5:09 Switch vs Switch 2 Docked performance comparison
6:52 Switch vs Switch 2 Handheld performance comparison
7:52 Summary
title: Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom and Breath of the Wild Switch 2: Performance Review

author: IGN
description:
The Bornless is a first-person PvPvE horror extraction game with a unique twist that turns the tables on players in the later stages. This debut game from indie developer Cathedral Studios, is set on the mysterious Farmouth Island in the 1960s, where players must fight cultists, a pantheon of demons and other players. Filled with horror icons and a terrifying gameplay twist, here’s what makes The Bornless a different extraction game. Sponsored by Cathedral Studios. 

Wishlist The Bornless on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2411280/The_Bornless/
Join The Bornless Discord: https://discord.gg/thebornless
title: What Makes The Bornless a Different Extraction Game

Happy Nintendo Switch 2 launch week! From hands-on impressions of Mario Kart World and Zelda to on-stage chaos with Knockout Tour (yes, someone gets pied in the face).

See Cyberpunk 2077’s first main mission, The Rescue, on Nintendo Switch 2 captured in Performance Mode, docked, and with a Pro Controller. A note from our gameplay capturer: “The Joy-Con’s dead zone is immediately noticeable and makes precision awkward. We’re experimenting with the best settings to make it less so, and using a Pro Controller makes it marginally better.”
